class load_all.HealthExperienceDistribution(**kwargs)ÔÉÅ

Bases: Base

SQLAlchemy model representing health and experience distribution in the game.

Variables:

  • id ‚Äì int Primary key for health and experience distribution.

  • text_id ‚Äì int Foreign key referencing the associated Script‚Äôs id.

  • health ‚Äì int Health value associated with the distribution.

  • experience ‚Äì int Experience value associated with the distribution.

  • health_enemy ‚Äì int Enemy health value associated with the distribution.

Relationships:
textrelationship

Relationship with the Script table using the foreign key text_id.

class load_all.LineScript(**kwargs)ÔÉÅ

Bases: Base

SQLAlchemy model representing a line of script in the game.

Variables:

  • id ‚Äì int Primary key for the line of script.

  • text_id ‚Äì int Foreign key referencing the associated Script‚Äôs id.

  • option_a_id ‚Äì int Foreign key referencing the Script id for option A.

  • option_b_id ‚Äì int Foreign key referencing the Script id for option B.

  • next_dialog_option_a_id ‚Äì int Foreign key referencing the Script id for the next dialog option A.

  • next_dialog_option_b_id ‚Äì int Foreign key referencing the Script id for the next dialog option B.

  • location_id ‚Äì int Foreign key referencing the location id associated with the line of script.

Relationships:
textrelationship

Relationship with the Script table using the foreign key text_id.

option_arelationship

Relationship with the Script table using the foreign key option_a_id.

option_brelationship

Relationship with the Script table using the foreign key option_b_id.

next_dialog_option_arelationship

Relationship with the Script table using the foreign key next_dialog_option_a_id.

next_dialog_option_brelationship

Relationship with the Script table using the foreign key next_dialog_option_b_id.

locationrelationship

Relationship with the Locations table using the foreign key location_id.

Bases: Base

SQLAlchemy model representing a script in the game.

Variables:

  • id (int) ‚Äì Primary key for the script.

  • text (str) ‚Äì The text content of the script.
